## Sampling Distributions

- 1 slip of paper - write word or phrase key to the definition of sampling distribution

- Words on board

- Packets passed out with additional words/phrases

- Select words to create definition of sampling distribution


Words:

- sample
- shape
- general dispersion
- difference between a value and an average value
- probability
- behavior of a sample
